text:
<@U89DUQGKD> you can just add attributes with whatever field names youre using
```{% dnd_module               
path='@HubSpot/linked_image',
img={
  'src':     get_asset_url('../images/grayscale-mountain.png'),
   'size_type': 'auto',
   'alt': 'group of employees looking at screen'
}
%}```
can you do this with custom modules as well? What about if there is a field group, and you want to access a field in that group? I did not find anything like that in the documentation
yupp! If its a field group its similar to the the “img” above. The group is just an object with properties/attributes inside of it.
